April Pilon
Senior Recruitment Consultant - Advanced Analytics (San Francisco) at Harnham
BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE MANAGERMONROVIA, CA - HYBRID (1-2 DAYS PER WEEK IN OFFICE) $150-175K This a fantastic opportunity to join a large eCommerce marketplace company as a Business Intelligence Manager. The business is taking off as it combines extensive experience in technology and digital marketing with traditional sourcing and supply chain knowledge.You'll be a leader within the Strategy & Analytics department to help address business priorities using business intelligence. Role Overview - Business Intelligence ManagerServe as the primary advocate for the application of BI tools and resources Develop strong relationships with key stakeholders across the organization with effective and consistent communication to understand business needs Manage a team of 3-5 reporting & business analysts, mentoring and directing Execute strategic projects, including the roadmap for the adoption of business intelligenceDesigning and implementing ETL tools and processes Ensure the user experience is efficient and user-friendlySkills And ExperienceA minimum of 5 years experience in analytics, ideally as a business intelligence analyst, data analyst, or reporting analyst Advanced skills with a BI tool, such as Tableau, Power BI, or Looker Expert SQL skills in writing SQL queries and optimizing data modelsBachelor's degree in a quantitative field is preferred - Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or similar disciplinesExcellent communication skills with the ability to develop relationships with stakeholders and executives across all business functionsHOW TO APPLY:Please register your interest by sending your resume to April Pilon via the Apply link on this page.
